document.docAuthor: Alipanah, Helen, Yakovlev, Roman, Falsafi, Hossein, Witt, Thomas & Saldaitis, Aidas

bibRefCitation.author: Teich, C. A.
bibRefCitation.refString: Teich, C. A. (1896) Einiges uber kaukasische Lepidopteren. Entomologische Zeitung (Stettiner Entomologische Zeitung), 57, 27 - 28.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Cossus araraticus Teich, 1896
, Stett. Ent. Ztg. 57: 28.

LT: Igdyn [prov. Igdir , NE Turkey ], Mugansteppe [S. Armenia , Mugan]. Type material ( syntypes ) in MNHR
.

Cossus cossus armeniaca Rothschild, 1912
,
syn. n.

Cossus cossus armeniaca Rothschild, 1912
, in: Seitz, Gross-Schmett. Erde 2 (1): 451.

LT: Hadjin [ Adana prov. , Taurus Mts., central Turkey ]. Type material ( holotype ) in BMNH
.

LT: Sultan Dagh [Sultandagi, prov. Afyon , central Turkey ]. Type material ( holotype ) in NMW
.

Diagnosis. During this study, a great number of material of
Cossus cossus
from Caucasus, Transcaucasia, Eastern Turkey and NW Iran , including the type specimens of both
C. cossus armeniaca Rothschild, 1912
and
C. cossus araraticus Teich, 1896
were examined; however, no significant morphological differences among the studied specimens were observed. Therefore, here we conider
C. cossus araraticus
as senior synonym of
C. cossus armeniaca
,
syn. n.
